name: Freddi Fish: Kelp Seed Mystery
description:
The award-winning best-selling Humongous children’s property made
popular on the PC is now available for Wii!

Help the Sea Creatures and Save the Reef! Grandma Grouper’s kelp seeds
are missing and, without them, all of the sea creatures will go hungry!
Help underwater detective Freddi Fish and her finny friend Luther solve
the case. Explore marine caves, deep canyons, and fascinating places
like King Crab’s Castle in an effort to rescue the colorful reef!
